channel.title: Close, fixed problem ;)

item.title: Close, fixed problem ;)
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

I wanted to make that when you equip your the npc comes up.
I made this but it doesn’t work…

I placed it under:

	public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1635 == true && playerIsMember >= 1){ //Gold Ring-Penguin server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(131, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; } else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1635 == true && playerIsMember <= 0){ //Gold Ring-Penguin sendMessage("Become A Member!"); }

Maybe also possible that when you take off the ring it dissapears?

Read full topic
